arts.ttl: Maresca explains celebration after Chelsea goal against Gent
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca has revealed his joyous celebrations after Chelsea’s fourth goal against Gent were due to his happiness at seeing Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall open his account for the club. Dewsbury-Hall signed for Chelsea in a £30m deal from Leicester City in the summer but has struggled for regular first-team football during the season’s opening weeks. […] The post Maresca explains celebration after Chelsea goal against Gent first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Chelsea missed out on wonderkid who caused Man Utd ‘nightmares’
arts.sum: Chelsea have been told they missed out on ‘absolutely brilliant’ Samu Omorodion after the Porto striker played a starring role for the Portuguese club as they came within a whisker of beating Manchester United on Thursday. Instead, the 20-year-old completed a move to Porto from Atletico Madrid for just €15m.

arts.ttl: Many Chelsea fans are saying the same thing about Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall after his performance vs Gent
arts.sum: Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall scored his first ever Chelsea goal in yesterday’s success in the Conference League at home to Gent. Chelsea kickstarted the Conference League group...

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca is about to reap the rewards of £12m investment as Chelsea truth highlighted
arts.sum: Pedro Neto arrived from Wolves in a deal worth more than £50million, with Portugal teammate and former Chelsea loanee Joao Felix then joining the winger in west London ten days later after completing a permanent move from Atletico Madrid. Renato Veiga was maybe viewed as one for the future after joining from Basel in a £12million deal but he is making a big impact in west London right now.

arts.ttl: Ex-Arsenal and Chelsea star may bring biggest transfer market change for 30 years
arts.sum: Former Chelsea and Arsenal midfielder Lassana Diarra will on Friday learn the decision made by the Court of Justice of the European Union following a decade-long battle against FIFA

arts.ttl: £35m Chelsea player failed to take his chance to impress Enzo Maresca despite 4-2 win vs Gent - opinion
arts.sum: It was mostly a night of positives for Chelsea as they kickstarted their Conference League group stages with a comprehensive 4-2 win over Gent. The...

arts.ttl: Fabrizio Romano clarifies Josh Acheampong “situation” as Newcastle circle for Chelsea wonder kid
arts.sum: Although he might be considered one for the future given just how many players Chelsea have in their first-team squad at present, there’s little doubt that Josh Acheampong has what it takes to be a success at Stamford Bridge. One Premier League appearance for five minutes last season, and 27 minutes in the Carabao Cup […] The post Fabrizio Romano clarifies Josh Acheampong “situation” as Newcastle circle for Chelsea wonder kid appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Every word Enzo Maresca said on Chelsea win vs Gent, Dewsbury-Hall goal and Veiga performance
arts.sum: I think if we want to be one step forward, even when you are 4-1 and the game is almost finished, you need to continue and not concede another goal. In this moment it is like this but the important thing is that changing players, you can see the identity of the team.

arts.ttl: Ex-Chelsea physio Eva Carneiro now owns football club years after row with Jose Mourinho
arts.sum: Despite facing sexist abuse from fans and harsh criticism from Jose Mourinho during her time with Chelsea, former physio Eva Carneiro has carved herself a completely different role in football

arts.ttl: Cole Palmer nears Cristiano Ronaldo Man Utd mark after record four-goal outing
arts.sum: Cole Palmer set a Premier League record when he scored four goals against Brighton and could set another with the sale of the shirt he was wearing challenging Cristiano Ronaldo's mark
